title: Poet

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose to Write. If you do, each player who visited you tonight will be saved to your Memoir. Instead of doing this, you may also select a player to add to your Memoir (astrally). You know who's on your Memoir.
- If every living player is listed in your Memoir, you may choose 2 people on there to deal an unstoppable attack to.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If every living player is listed on your Memoir, the Conclusion becomes "*The protagonist's final wishes are to write down their story. Their writing is a sad and long tale. Some people are brutally killed as impassioned readers seek revenge on the villains of the story.*" When the story is completed with this Introduction, you deal an unstoppable attack to all non-Storyteller players.

desc:
Post 3531
"*In a hundred years, who will remember me unless I write?*"
